website_summaries.verdict: Best choice for those who don't like cords interfering while they clean.
pros: No need to plug and unplug cords from outlets
Vacuum is fully charged within four hours
Works on carpets and bare floors
Sleek design means you can proudly leave this out on display
cons: Some say that like all cordless vacuums, it works better on bare floors than rugs or carpets

website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a lightweight model that's inexpensive and suited for small to mid-size cleanup tasks, this cordless option is worth a look.
pros: A budget-priced cordless stick vacuum that stands out for its compact build and light weight of only 7.5 lb
Easy to handle and empty the dust cup
cons: While we like that it's rechargeable, it takes up to four hours to get a full charge

website_summaries.verdict: This cordless but bulky option is lightweight and easy to use.
pros: Swivel steering maneuvers awkward spaces and under furniture
Two-speed brush roll allows for easy transitioning from bare floor to carpets
cons: Takes a long time for the battery to charge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacuum cleaner, makes me hate vacuuming a whole lot less
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost a year to write this review. This is the best little vacuum cleaner in the universe. Everything about the design is thoughtful. Convenient to take apart and empty, put back together, remove and clean the filter, recharge. Ease of use is unparalleled due to light weight and rotating head. All my life I have hated vacuuming, and I still don't adore it, but this little cordless machine takes away 88% of the intrinsic aggravation. Does carpet or bare floor depending on adjustment of a step-on button. I have 3 hair-shedding pets and it takes care of everything efficiently. It does not stink while operating, it is not particularly noisy, and it has a friendly vibe.
customer_reviews.author: thoroughbred21

customer_reviews.title: Good...for one year!
customer_reviews.text: Well, considering it just died on me yesterday, which is a little over a year since I purchased it (August 2016), I am going to have to give this a 1 star review for not being durable. It also scratched our bamboo floors in a few places but that could be overlooked by being extra careful and IF it kept working. Overall, if it does last for more than a year you can't really say it's a good product. I guess I am out of luck with the warranty being 1 year...
customer_reviews.author: Integra

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I have OCD. 😬 I love the shark cordless. Don’t waste your money on other vaccines. Why!??? This one a quality vacuum that get the job done. I have carpet and hardwood floors. It works well on both, this product is made for daily, quick pick ups. I’ve bougjt a total of 5 vacuums for family and friends. The best part is I can clean each level of my house with the battery! I e tried several other brands in the past and the worst is, when you’re in the cleaning zone and it does, there’s nothing more frustrating. I can do my whole upstairs and down stairs! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Neis

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year and a half ago. I'm now on Amazon looking for a new cordless vacuum because this one no longer works. After a few month the spinning brush stopped working. A few months after that the bottom kept falling off so it was held together by duct tape. And now it just doesn't suck up at all. I only used this vacuum in my upstairs laundry room to clean up cat litter. It never experienced heavy use. It was a complete waste of money. And it never worked well.
customer_reviews.author: jhob123

customer_reviews.title: No suction after two months of minimal use
customer_reviews.text: After just two months of twice weekly use, this vacuum has already stopped working. The brushes still spring but there's absolutely no suction, which means dust and debris just shoots out the back of the vacuum. I live in a 300 square foot apartment (efficiency studio) and am incredibly shocked that after such minimal use it's already useless. I'll be sure to avoid the shark brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E Henry

customer_reviews.title: Biggest worthless piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of crap i ever bought!! Says for pickup animal hairs?? Please!!! I have hardwood floors so you would think easy pickup but with this piece of crap its a choir. First of all the suction is worthless. I move it near hair abd i actually have to be on top of the hair! Then after a few sweeps the damn tube clogs and you have to take the body off and stick a hangar up to clear. Piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason T from Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Can't buy replacement belts
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for one year but then the belt started slipping. I couldn't find a replacement anywhere so I called customer service. They told me I'd have to buy the entire lower portion of the vacuum (listed at $72) because they don't sell belts for the lower level vacuums. I told them everything is working fine but I just needed the belt. That was my option. I won't be purchasing another Shark product (I also have the steam mop, which works great) so it's their loss. Not paying $72 because they can't offer replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Duzan

customer_reviews.title: Meh.. Pros and cons..
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cordless is awesome Light and easy to maneuver Works on hardwood, carpet and rugs Decent job at getting hair ( 5 women, a cat, and a beard in my house) Cons: Less than 6 months in my brush roll is sticking Charge barely lasts long enough for me to get my house (not enough to also do stairs) Canister is small and fills quickly I can't find a replacement brush to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first year, throw after that
customer_reviews.text: Its a very effective vacuum, convenient, handy, cleans fast - but only for about 12 months. My vacuum started giving me trouble after about 15 months. The suction would not work properly despite thorough cleaning. And finally, 18 months in, it died. It no longer sucks anything in either in carpet mode or on the floor. For something priced in the $70-80 range, I would at least want it to last 2 whole years. Very disappointed. Warning about battery life - Even when it was new, on full charge, it would run about 15 min max. I could vacuum maybe one small room at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: I was reviewing my past orders and was truly disgusted by the money I wasted on this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I was reviewing my past orders and was truly disgusted by the money I wasted on this vacuum. It is worthless. It does not pick up anything. After repeated attempts to use it in over a year of owning it, I finally emptied it and found it had collected about three tablespoons of dust. It is so "lightweight" that it won't even stay on the floor. On top of that, if you leave it in the recharging cradle, it flashed a blue light constantly that looks like the dirt police are pulling it over for "failure to clean." DO NOT buy this product. I'm dropping mine off for donation today. For $5, it might be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this powerhouse vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I just had a friend ask about my different vacuums and what I liked. I couldn’t say enough good things about the Shark. We’ve had it for 18 months and it’s the best vacuum cleaner ever. No cord means it goes everywhere quickly, lightweight so it’s easy to carry around, super suction power means it gets everything including pet hair, and the washable filter makes it easy to clean out after use. I thought the battery would die quickly but that isn’t the case - it does such a big area before needing to be recharged, it’s unbelievable. I will buy another one when this one dies eventually. But no signs of stopping for now!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Goodall

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy new newer model
customer_reviews.text: December 2016 I ordered my second shark navigator freestyle cordless stick vacuum. I could not say enough positive about that earlier model! Apparently they're selling a inferior product with a different model number. There is nothing good I can say about this new model. Weak suction- have to run repeatedly over a piece of lint! Less maneuverability-hard on my wrist.. Emptying cartridge stiffer. The blue recharge light flashes continuously even when charged. Very annoying plus I never know when it's fully charged. Would have returned immediately but had thrown away packaging boxes. Another review mentions 2 different model numbers. Apparently I got the crappy one the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Wagner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little upright vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum cleaner. Easy to use, charges, holds a charge, maneuverable. And very important: exceptionally easy to empty! The easiest to empty vacuum cleaner I've ever used and it picks up pet hair surprisingly well. Very impressive with four dogs in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn ArmstrongTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this vacuum on June 7th. Delivered super fast. Worked great but no longer charges. I expected a lot more from a Shark. Will never buy an appliance on Amazon again. If I would have made my purchase at Walmart at least I could return it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tabi Rexford

customer_reviews.title: A very powerful suction!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy with my Shark Stick Cordless Vacuum. I've been using it for two weeks and I'm so surprised how much dirt and debris it has picked up that obviously my Oreck has been missing. It's easy to empty and it's wonderful to not have to worry about a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Linda benita

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a year.
customer_reviews.text: Update: This vaccuum only lasted a year. The motor that spins the brush just stopped working one day, right after the one year warranty ended, which a lot of other reviews have noted. Great business model, Shark. In theory the size and movement of it is nice but it stopped holding a charge after the first month when the return window had closed. Also the bottom doesn’t detach to get the hard to reach areas like most vacuums which I was surprised about.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Ive had mine for almost 5 years and ive loved it. I have linoleum and hardwoods throughout most of my house (carpet in the bedrooms, which i use a regular-sized vacuum on). While this vacuum is definitely NOT perfect, it is close, in my opinion. I still have to sweep the periphery of my rooms because this vacuum doesnt get close enough. I can't remember how the suction power was when I first bought my vacuum, but it is not that great now. I am purchasing a new one now, and my current vacuum doesn't keep a charge very well now. I recommend this vacuum, as long as you dont expect perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Aymee Flood

customer_reviews.title: Dual voltage vacuum good on tiles, rugs
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this vacuum. I live overseas in Europe temporarily and I didn't want to buy a new vacuum that wouldn't work at home. I love that this vacuum is dual voltage, so I don't have to run it on a transformer to use it. It's tiny and gets under stuff easily. I have tile floors with rugs and this is the perfect compromise for me, since it works well on both. The only downside is that it doesn't have a hose tool or brush attachments, so I can't vacuum my couch (I have a cat), but it's perfect for what I need in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: This is a wast of money and time. No pets only 1 girl and 1 man inside the 1 bedroom apartment , clearly you can see how this garbage works , the maybe third time you use it you gonna have this , hair stuck on the rail gears , wheels and brush, it will stop working and a blue light will flash, won’t suck anything else until you disassemble like I did. Less then a year old and not many time used . GO WITH SOMETHING BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have loved and used this daily for a year and a half. It's light, picks up hair and small items well. We have hardwoods and area rugs so this was a good buy for us. Unfortunately in the last couple months it is starting to lose it's charge. There have been several times where it has charged for a whole day and the light indicates it's charged but it only lasts a couple minutes once turned on. Would love to give a higher rating but this is not a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Suck so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in a small off grid cabin. About 120 square feet. I can vacuum it about 6+ times before charging. The suction is better than two ex wives and all but one ex GF. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most cost effective product
customer_reviews.text: The product does an amazing job of picking up dog hair and dust. It does not pick up Schefflera plant leaves (about 1.5" long) that fall from my plant. Extremely easy to discharge the dirt picked up by the machine. Beautifully engineered. I bought a "refurbished" unit and it appears to be brand new, but without a bolt I needed that I had on hand anyway. This product is probably the most cost effective that I have ever had the pleasure of purchasing. A no-brainer for picking up dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stops taking a charge after awhile. 2nd Shark to do this.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great for everything! UNTIL IT STOPS CHARGING FOR NO REASON! The vacuum just stopped taking a charge one day. So I cleaned it, polished the sensors and nothing. Since I had it for a year and loved it otherwise, I just bought another one. I had that one for around one year also and the same thing happened. I don’t know if it is the charger or the machine itself. It has not been abused and I’ve cleaned and maintained this vacuum perfectly from day one. I’m over it. Moving on to a better brand! Word to the wise, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark. Had to rebuy because my movers destroyed the one I had bought in Oct of 2018. DID NOT LIKE THE HUGE PRICE JUMP - from $89 to $129 in 14 mos. Which is why it only got 4 stars. This is the same exact model, no difference. However I liked the way it worked so much, that I re purchased it. I do have a larger, heavy duty upright but the shark cleans the floor just as well and it’s a lot easier to maneuver around. I only pull out the heavier one when I need to make use of the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Marie

customer_reviews.title: the one I received has a cord and I wanted cordless.
customer_reviews.text: this is the description on my online order receipt: Shark Navigator Freestyle Upright Stick Cordless Bagless Vacuum for Carpet, Hard Floor and Pet with XL Dust Cup and 2-Speed Brushroll (SV1106), White/Grey Sold by: Amazon.com Services, Inc Return eligible through Jan 31, 2020 $89.99 Im to tired to send back today.. I also do not feel like plugging one in to try it. That is why I ordered cordless. it is not the same one in the picture even on my receipt. anyway I see it is $10 cheaper on amazon now so I feel all went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Amszi

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in April 2019. It was working well and then last week, October 22, 2019 the vacuum just stopped suctioning. I called the manufacturer and they wanted me to pay to ship it back so they could see if it needed replaced. So I get a product that only last me 6 months and now they want me to pay more money to get it replaced or repaired. I GET BETTER PRODUCTS AND CUSTOMER SERVICE AT WALLMART. I DID NOT WASTE ANYMORE MONEY , I WILL GO TO WALLMART AND BUY SOMETHING FOR HALF THE PRICE AND TWICE THE CUSTOMER SERVICE !!! VERY DISSAPOINTED !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M.

customer_reviews.title: Brush stopped rotating after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading a review from Young House Love, and I'm so disappointed in the quality - while it works great when it's actually working, the brush head stopped rotating after 9 months (meaning it essentially doesn't suck anything up), and even after taking it apart and following directions on repair, I still can't get it to work. I know this is an affordable vacuum, but man, only getting 9 months of use out of it is pretty dismal. I won't buy another Shark product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A Caulfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick pick ups -
customer_reviews.text: We wanted this because - well - we are lazy and complain about the crumbs on our hardwood kitchen floors but not enough to get out a broom or a corded vacuum - but this vacuum is perfect! Takes just a few minutes to do the entire kitchen/dining room - has power for carpet also! the run time is great!! and the unit is light enough my 3.5 y/o loves using it to help out!!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Race

customer_reviews.title: Sucks charging
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this shark cordless vacuum, I have not been able to use, due to not getting charged with the charging system! It sucks, I put it to charge, many times tried different areas and sockets, only charging for a one one vacuum, it sucks. I am very happy with my other shark products, I really thought this product would perform as well. But can’t hold the charge. Please send me a new charging system ASAP free of charge. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful on hard flooring surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Better than a broom!! We don't have any carpet anymore just rugs. This makes quickie clean ups very easy and do-able. It isn't the strength of a regular size vacuum but it does exactly what we need. It's rechargeable and doesn't take up much room. If this stops I will definitely get another because it makes my life that much easier, especially because I hate cleaning !!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna E

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on how great the battery life is on this stick vac I'm thoroughly disappointed! If it ran for more than 20 minutes before shutting itself off I would probably have given it 4 or 5 stars. From 1st charge through the first couple weeks of use we have never gotten it to run for more than 20 minutes! Thats on a full charge too! I figured we should give it a chance becauae the battery info says it can take 3-5 battery drains and full charges to reach its max battery life. We are well past that now. Today's use lasted only 10 minutes before it shut itself off! Very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Belt gave out twice. No replacement parts sold.
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this in December of 2016. Loved it. Lightweight, super easy to use and charge. In 2019 the belt gave out (brush roll would no longer turn). I was surprised to find out that Shark doesn't sell replacement parts for this vacuum! But, I liked it enough that I purchased another on in October 2019. Five months later, despite meticulous upkeep, the brush-roll has stopped spinning again. So frustrating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colette Mazunik

customer_reviews.title: Great option for frequent quick sweeps!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little vacuum! Our house is really old and has terribly placed outlets, so we finally got a cordless vacuum and it has been a game changer. We have a dog and a cat who both shed and this thing works great on our hardwood floors and area rugs. Only took away a Star because our battery was basically dead when it arrived so we had to wait for Shark to send a new one, then they sent the wrong size so we had to wait 4 weeks for another replacement...
customer_reviews.author: emthehuman

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Vacuum Ever!
customer_reviews.text: It's cordless and lasts a long time. There are two settings: one for floors and one for carpeting/rugs. Great for quick pickups and longer cleanings. I don't have to bend down to use it. It is also easy to keep clean. You don't have to purchase any vacuum bags because you just have to empty out the container. Once in a while I wash the sponge filter (quick & easy to do) and the secondary filter. I have recommended it to everyone I know. I barely use my expensive, cumbersome vacuum cleaner with many accessories because this little baby does the job better and faster! The suction for carpeting is very strong - terrific pick-up power!
customer_reviews.author: Theatrix

customer_reviews.title: Fix the bugs and they will be great!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased FIVE of these vacuum cleaners, and while I love them I am having problems with them breaking down within less than a year. They start to act sluggish then quit. This is being cause every time by the wiring coming loose in the motor. We have tried to repair them but they never last much longer. There is something in the way that they are wired and when the head pivots that causes the wires to come loose. Shark had better address this problem. That is WHY I have bought five....I really love the way they pick up, but they don't last, and my house is extremely clean so they don't get a vigorous workout!
customer_reviews.author: raven 53

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum didn’t even last a year. After calling the support desk three times (and getting disconnected twice after going through all the prompts) I was told I would need to wait for them to send me a shipping label, find a box to send the defective product back in and then pay for shipping of a new vaccum. I didn’t expect this vaccum to last forever, but thought it would at least make it through the warranty period. Very disappointed with the quality of the product and the support. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This my second Shark Navigator. The first one I had for 5 years. It stopped working after bumping down stairs too many times. It wasn't until after I threw it out and got a new one that I realized that it may have been a bad (and easy to fix) connection where the handle connects to vacuum head. Anyway, this is a great vacuum. I have a golden retriever that sheds a prodigious amount hair. I vacuum nearly daily and it picks up all the hair from carpets, furniture, and hardwood floors. The battery stays charged, and, if the last one was any indication, the rechargeable battery should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keith Brown

customer_reviews.title: Was good until...
customer_reviews.text: Only have had this for 2 months. The lock that holds the plastic cover over the roller and belt doesn't stay in the locked position so it is continually now slides into the unlock and falls off while vacuuming. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: spence

customer_reviews.title: Not Great with Dog Hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for daily cleanup, hoping it would help us stay on top of the dog hair situation on our house (we have a husky and a beagle). We have mostly hard floors, with carpet in the bedrooms. It absolutely DOES NOT work with dog hair and carpets. Clogs every time. I'm not even sure it would work on pet-free carpets. As for the hard floors, it will work for a little while without clogging but eventually I have to take it apart and clean it out. This vacuum might work great if you have hard floors and short-haired pets, but that's it. Not worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: A.Erw

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hairdresser and work in a small suite alone. My waiting area is carpeted with industrial carpet that my guests and I track hair on from the cutting floor. I had just vacuumed with my previous cordless vac when my new shark arrived. It was super easy to assemble. It is very lightweight. The included pictures show what it picked up the first use. I was appalled at what was on my floor!!! I love this vacuum and highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: sassy1redhead

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cordless vacuums on the market.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for past 4-5 months now and we are very happy about this product. We tried the more expensive ones modem looking units but felt that the weight on the wrist and hand was too much. We wanted mobility without Wires. This unit proved to be perfect. Our house has complete wooden flooring so our needs are light for vacuum. We see what we need to clean. The unit is perfect. Light weight. Great automatic charging at the dock. Transparent trash collection. Powerful enough to suck dirt out of rugs and carpets. I would not qualify this review by saying this is good value for the money but I would say this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a great gizmo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! Makes cleaning so much easier. I'm on the older side, and love how lightweight it is. One minor design flaw: pushing it under furniture presses the start button and turns it down or off. That's OK though. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lundmark

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. This worked only for less than 6months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This worked only for less than 6months. I made sure filters are good each time I vacuum. It started blowing instead of sucking. Strange. Can’t even suck a string on the carpet. Never expected from Sharp to manufacturer such a cheap quality product. Even though I got 80% of refund coz of no warranty, I’m okay with that but not to use this product never again.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Rao

customer_reviews.title: Best small vacuum that I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if you live in a condo, apartment or smaller house, this is THE vacuum for you. This lightweight rechargable unit makes quick cleanup easy; no plug-in cord to deal with, no heavy vacuum to drag out! Suction is powerful and there are levels for carpet and tile/wood floors. And, it's easy to empty the catch container. This unit does not have a hose attachment, so don't expect it to rid your cobwebs or dust shelves; it can't. But if you need an easy to operate, light machine, this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Butler

customer_reviews.title: Useful portable vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vac mainly for cat litter and it works great, quick clean up as needed and I don't have to get out the heavy-duty vacuum cleaner. This one is lightweight, so easy to use and quick empty of dirt; great for picking up pet hair too. It is the perfect match for my regular vacuum cleaner. The suction is good for a small vac, easy to store, comes with a recharging station and I can vacuum the whole room on a charge several times and it is still going strong. I am very happy with this portable vac.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking - there are better choices
customer_reviews.text: Consider a Deik instead. Benefit from my experience with a disposable appliance. What to say . . . unit died after three years of fairly light use on hard floors. Now it's in a landfill (except for the batteries which to be honest I enjoyed harvesting since it involved a hammer and goggles). Poorly designed. The business end of the thing was too tall to fit under the edges of the kitchen cabinets - where most of the dirt is. I would think the designers would use the height of a dishwasher door hinge off the floor and be sure their vacuum at least fit under that. But apparently not.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M Linkous

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little battery operated machine. We use it on hardwood, tile and low pile carpet. We have three dogs so we are constantly confronted with little fur tumbleweeds and stray fuzzies; dragging out the major vacuum was, well, a drag. The shark offers us a quick and easy alternative. We can do the major traffic areas of the house plus the master bedroom and bath on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Filmdoc2001

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: i wasn't sure if this vacuum was going to be good enough considering it was such a good price but it is my favorite vacuum now! cordless and bagless, this is the easiest vacuum to use. I have a small 2 bedroom apartment and this does the job for me! I charge it over night and haven't run out of battery usage whenever i use it during the day. Its definitely not the best on tiles but my kitchen is a tiny corner kitchen so its not the easiest to clean regardless. but this vacuum works great on carpets and wood floors!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Barely had it a year and already broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to keep in my closet where my cats' litter box is. The only thing I used it for was to vacuum the two rugs I have and vacuum up stray litter from the tile in my walk-in closet. First of all it wasn't super great at picking up litter. It threw it around the floor so I would have to vacuum in circles to get it all up. Ive literally only had to charge the thing twice which is really nice except now the brush doesn't turn and there's no suction from the machine. My mother has had this same model Shark for 4 years now and it's an absolute dream. This new model is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, but nothing to rave about
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum based on reviews I had read, but was disappointed with it for several reasons. The time it takes to recharge is extremely long and at most it runs for 30 minutes before it requires 6-7 hours of charging. It's more awkward to handle than expected and isn't easy to use on stairs or in corners. I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This Shark does a good job on hair and dust on wood floors. On carpets you just change the setting with your foot and you are ready to go. The weight is very light; can lift it with one hand easily. On stairs it is awkward a bit, but having no cord to bother with makes it doable. Suction is good. Charging takes only a few hours. Cleaning the basket where debris and hair/dirt goes is very simple. Would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in VA

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum—when it works properly and for Only about a year!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum-when it works! Battery life starts decreasing just after a year. I’ve owned 2 and had to purchase new at about the 14mth mark for each to have a vacuum that lasts more than 3-5mins on a full charge. So if you don’t mind purchasing a new one every year.... Also- my third one- roller stopped working after the second use. Followed all the steps to remove hair and debris and still won’t rotate for more than a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Happy 9 point Vacum.  Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I received my first one Dec 2013 as a gift and it’s still works great. I bought this one for our church office. Absolutely great unit. Cons. It’s has fragile clips for removal of parts for cleaning. Great performance, weights, recharge friendly and price friendly. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: zDon Bry

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and effective. Needs to be emptied frequently but is no problem!
customer_reviews.text: Small cup that has to be emptied frequently but it's worth it for the ease of emptying, suction power and effectiveness on both hardwood and carpet. I have two fluffy dogs and a long haired cat to clean up after and seems to be better than my newish, corded vacuum. It does not handle clumps of "fluff" from my pets stuffed animals very well but everything else seems to be no match for it. Would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work at ALL. I am extremely disappointed as I’ve heard such great things about sharks. We have a Dyson for the whole house but wanted something smaller to have upstairs for our laundry room/litter box. It doesn’t pick up ANYTHING. And I’m outside of the return window at this point so I’m just out $100.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum started out good
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is really great for the price. Cordless vacuuming is life changing. Easy disposals because you don’t need a bag just push a button and dump it in the trash. Takes a while to charge but would rather have to charge it than have a cord. Update I’ve only had the vacuum for about nine months and it’s officially broken. The handle and the part of the vacuum that actually vacuums (not sure the term) fall apart when I pull it back. The little side wheel broke off. The locking mechanism on the bottom to take the brush out to clean- has broken. This vacuum was good at first. But not worth the $ in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100 uses at $89 does not seem like a good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Got a little over a year on this. - , used it once a week (kids would do their vacuum chores with it once a week - we'd use an Electrolux for the real vacuuming). After a couple months the vacuum head fell off the stick. the button to press to dislodge the head from stick would not stick back out far enough to keep the two pieces together. I fudged it and was back in business. After about month 12, it would no longer turn on. Roughly 52-100 uses tops and it was broken. 100 uses at $89 does not seem like a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: MoJO

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying this.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the the linx Hoover for 3 years and loved it. I wanted one for my top floor, but saw this vacuum and the reviews are great so I thought this might be even better. This thing has such weak power and doesn't suck things up the way my linx does. I have little kids that have dropped cereal, goldfish and all kinds of things. This vacuum can't suck these things up well so I sweep them up because takes way less time. I would have sent it back, but opened it past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Eul

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight cordless vac.
customer_reviews.text: I have a full size “plug in” Shark that works great for heavy duty carpet cleaning, but wanted something cordless and light weight mainly for area rugs and bare floors. As usual, Shark delivers. Easy to put together and easy to use. If you take care of things, they last a long time. My original Shark is about 7 years old and still works great. I clean it out after each use and wash and dry the filter fairly often. The new one works well on bare floors or low pile carpet and area rugs.
customer_reviews.author: cookies

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we want
customer_reviews.text: We have pets. It does very well at picking up spilled pet food, cat litter and pet dander ( whatever that is ) The wheels make noise and appear to be of low quality but the machine itself works well. We never have run out of battery and we have a 1500 sq ft home. The suction is great and it is easy to clean and empty the container. Very good buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE DREAM!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended the Shark and I am happy to say- it was the best advice I ever took. I was so stressed about dog hair in my house especially with kids running around. This machine is lightweight, charges easily and can be used for a few minutes just to keep my house tidy. I can even run it when my four year old is sleeping at night. I am thrilled and will stick with this product line if I should need anything else. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: E. Richeal

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product was more than I expected. When the package arrived and was so lightweight I was pretty sceptical even before I took it out of the box. Once assembled(it was very easy) I charged it. When I used it to clean up tile floors I was absolutely amazed at the power this little machine has. The charge lasts a good half hour. I get tired of vacuuming long before this machine does. If I had to say something negative it would be that the head does not rotate as easily as I had hoped. I WOULD buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kozyz

customer_reviews.title: Makes vacuuming so easy! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum! Makes it so easy! Cordless, rotating neck, super easy to empty the dust cup, etc. The only thing is that a full charge doesn’t last long, only maybe 15-20 min max each time. I have an apartment and it usually runs out of battery after my living room and half the bedroom. But this is a major upgrade from what I had so I am very satisfied. If you have a large house, you might need more power or just have this as a secondary vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Where does the dirt go??
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shark upright navigator 3 months ago even though one of my neighbors and my coworker told me theirs broke in a few months. I loved it at first but now I can’t figure where the heck the dirt is going?? I vacuum twice a week and it seems to do a good job but when I pull off the dust cap there is nothing inside. I’ve taken the whole thing apart and I don’t see where the dirt is going. I would like to send this thing back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ianni

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick Vacuum to access
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works great. I've had it completely taken apart per the instructions and had no issues with their accuracy and ease of assembly. The Upper Screen does require some effort to pull straight out, but once you've experienced how much leverage is required it will not be an issue the 2nd time. The unit performs well. Make sure you keep your roller brushes clean by cutting away/removing any carpet strings, animal hair or debris that could wrap around the roller...enjoy! I never or vary rarely grade anything 5 stars unless it unexpectedly exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A Parkhurst Jr

customer_reviews.title: ... this Shark because the other vacuums come so highly recommended. While the power is terrific
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Shark because the other vacuums come so highly recommended. While the power is terrific, the battery would not hold a charge for longer than 30 minutes, even on indoor/outdoor carpet. The last 6 hour charge only lasted about 12 minutes. (The book does say that you may have to charge the vacuum 3-5 times before it will hold a longer charge, so we tried four different times. Each time was less. Shark replaced the battery but I still cannot get a longer use time. I am disappointed in the short period I can use it, but otherwise, I would recommend if you are only going to use the vac for quick pick ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: What's crazy is that it doesn't feel like the suction is very hard, but the proof is in the canister after each vacuum! My vacuum of 11 years finally died and I bought this to hold me over until I can afford another Sebo. It's lightweight, cordless, and does the job! We have a cat and a dog and it seems to be collecting everything it's supposed to! The downside is it doesn't have any attachments, but it's still a great little vacuum! It does well on my tile areas as well! My 10 year old son got my "love of vaccuming" gene and has used it more than me over the last few days!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Wycoff

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: This won't replace your main vacuum, but it's so convenient! I'm vacuuming much more often now, which is exactly why I wanted this. I have three cats, two of them long haired, and it's doing fine. It's doing well on hard floors as well as carpet. Update: clearing a clog is much too difficult. Can't get it apart! The push button access doesn't work. A bent coat hanger doesn't reach the clog very well. Bad design!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works!
customer_reviews.text: If I had reviewed it before it stopped working it would have gotten 5 stars. I loved it. So easy to use. It stopped picking up a few days ago after only less than a year's use. I had bought the warranty from Asurion but they haven't gotten back with me. If anyone has any suggestions for what to do, let me know.
customer_reviews.author: maggie black

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Best easy, light, quick vacuum ever! This is my second one and I can’t live without it. We have a heavy duty vacuum for big jobs with extensions n such but think if this as a high powered dust buster where you don’t have to bend over! Zero complaints. A must-have ESPECIALLY with children. I could go on and on about this vacuum. I will also add that I am a clean freak and I have fibro. This vacuum has saved my life!
customer_reviews.author: Itsallinthename

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!! My aunt recommended it to me, I have 2 little ones running around so we have occational crumbs thrown around. I love it. Quick and easy to use and put together. My son even enjoys helping with the vacuuming. So much easier now without the cable getting the way. My coworker just so haplened to blpurchase one as well and she gave a raving review
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep it çleaned out and you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome! Just love the fact that it runs on a charge and no cord to deal with! The only problem was twice now we have had to clean it out completely! This is our fault though! It has been quite awhile since the carpet had a good vacuuming!! Our other vacuum took a pooper a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great start with high hopes, has now broken on me twice!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this vacuum twice now and within 6-9 months this vacuum breaks. Initially it starts strong, great power and easy to maneuver, but within that time frame, the spinner on the bottom breaks, leaving debris on the ground and operating at a louder volume. It's a shame that this has now happened to me twice. I would not recommend this product if you have pets, or if you find the carpet picks up any type of hair as I think that could be part of the issue here.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berner

customer_reviews.title: Shark Navigator Stick Cordless Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum and in fact have 2 of them now so no waiting for recharges. I cannot believe what a great job it does for as light weight and easy as it is. Super quality and totally simple to take apart for cleaning. But remember this little sweetheart is for those fast clean up jobs not for deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches and Me

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We had a Shark cordless vacuum just like this one for many years. When it finally quit working, I ordered a new one just like it. I use it for quick pick ups between major cleanings. I use it at least 3 times a week. The canister is easy to empty and the filter is easy to wash, dry and put back in. I like it so much that I am going to buy one for each of my 5 grown children for their homes.
customer_reviews.author: Margy Herren

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this vacuum actually
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this vacuum actually. Its lightweight + no cords, makes vacuuming real easy and quick. Easy to clean and empty. Pick up things great. The only thing I'd say I'm not happy with is that hair do tend to get stuck underneath it and there's no way removing them other than cut them with scissors and then pull (if you have short hair you probably won't have this issue). You can notice suction suffering from it so you have to do it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: sfinks27

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these, and both exhibit the same design flaw. After a while, the on/off switch just stops working. It sticks on, or won't start. There have been other units exactly like this one, that are on EBAY, that are exhibiting the same problem. I'll not buy a Shark brand again.
customer_reviews.author: SammIam

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Upright I have ever purchased. Love the cordless feature, I am able to vaccum my entire apartment and it is so easy to recharge and store, just place it in my linen closet, grab it whenever I need it and start vaccuming right away, then just place it on the stand to charge. Don't have to worry about plugging and unplugging appliances while I'm cleaning. It is so powerful that it has picked up cat hairs I never thought were there and emptying the canister is so easy! I love my Shark Navigator, unless they come up with a better one, I'l never by another brand!
customer_reviews.author: SpanishLady

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy !
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you plan on using it daily to pick up pet hair! I have only had this since January and have used it on a daily basis to pick up pet hair on my LVF and have cleaned it daily and washed the filter but it locked up because to much hair had wrap around the roller end caps and then around the motor! I had cleared the roller after each use but had no clue about the end caps. Now I have a non working vacuum that’s only two months old!
customer_reviews.author: William M Bernard Jr

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used my item a few times but I must say I am in LOVE with it! It does great on my carpet and is so light weight! I've only used it for about 45 mins at a time but the battery lasts the whole time! Only Con is that it doesn't have a detachable hose for cracks but that's okay! Very satisfied! Update: after using this vacuum for about 2 weeks, the suction has stopped working and it will not pick anything up! I do not recommend this product! Worst $100 I’ve spent!
customer_reviews.author: heather hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Best $100 ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my 1600 sqft ranch home, even on the carpet setting, in one charge. My favorite part of this vacuum is how light it is - much easier to maneuver than our Dyson. Even my two young children can grab it off the charger and vacuum up messes by themselves. We bought ours used/refurbished without any issues (so far.)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Shark Navigator Freestyle has great performance but limited usage time
customer_reviews.text: The convenience and performance of the Shark Navigator Freestyle is impressive. Dog hair, dust, and general household debris are easily picked up by this little giant. The light weight makes it useful on stairs and in hard to reach areas. Great tool for small apartments or light cleaning but the battery life makes it impractical for use as a primary vacuum in a moderate to large home.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Willis

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum in June and by October it was trash. The small front wheels fell off any time you bumped the front against a baseboard or piece of furniture. The power button is in a horrible spot because if you run the vacuum under cabinets, furniture, etc., the power button is pressed so you are constantly turning it back on. After 4 months on wood floors, my daughter was using it and it suddenly made a loud noise and shut off, never to turn on again. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for over a year. We use it multiple times every single day because we have a toddler. It picks up everything on hard floors. It works well on carpets also. The canister is easy to dump out. I highly recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Perfect for stairs. Very lightweight. Good suction power. Very good for older people because it’s so lightweight and not bulky. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: A quick picker-upper
customer_reviews.text: Note: I don’t use this as my only vacuum cleaner and I rarely use it on carpeting. That said, I love this product. I use it every day for cleaning my bathroom floor, and to quickly pick up small amounts of debris like dry pet food or cat litter bits from my kitchen or hardwood floors, or area rugs. I have found it to be durable, lightweight, easy to empty (which I do once or at most twice a week) and it is an essential part of my housekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineSharon

customer_reviews.title: At first this vacuum was great. Lasted about 8 months before the motor went ...
customer_reviews.text: At first this vacuum was great. Lasted about 8 months before the motor went out. Called to get a new motor, but it wouldn't work with the battery pack I had (the model number Amazon ships is different than listed in the product description). So, I called Shark again and this time I was thrilled because they shipped me a brand new vacuum. However, within a month, the motor stopped working on the "new"one as well. Very disappointed in this product. Would not recommend. While customer service is great, the vacuum keeps breaking down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy amazon customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the vacuum but I am very very disappointed in Amazon because I gave it as a Christmas present this year 2019 and the vacuum stopped working February 2, 2019. According to Amazon my return date expired on January 31, 2020 I was hoping to have it replaced by Amazon. I would love to have a response to this message
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J.

customer_reviews.title: Great a year or so, then craps out on you right after the warranty expires, of course
customer_reviews.text: Well, this worked great while it lasted, but probably only made to last until the warranty expires. A few months ago, it started to intermittently lose suction while vacuuming and go back and forth between working and just making a lot of noise and not picking anything up at all. Now it pretty much stops working - the motor just whines and there is no suction. Of course, this only started happening after Shark's crappy one year warranty expired. Does anyone make a quality product these days? Come on, Shark, you can do better than this. Truly disappointed with what seemed to be a great product at first only to be let down a short time later. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly folks
customer_reviews.text: When you are elderly, this is the best vacuum to have for clean up. Great suction, light weight and easy to maneuver, bulk of weight is on the floor. Easy to empty. And cordless, nothing to bend over to plug in or trip over. Please keep this one in stock for the aging folks out there.
customer_reviews.author: k.m. m.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this!! I bought this for cleaning up small messes due to a new pet. It works so well, start cleaning something small and just keep going. The suction is so great it made me realize I might need to buy a new canister vacuum. The charging station is great on your back as you just slide it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice little efficient vacuum. Very pleasantly surprised at its efficiency. Easy to assemble, easy to empty and clean. I have a very sheddy dog and a big long-haired cat, and this vacuum does a great job. Don’t expect deep cleaning with this though, and you may be disappointed at no accesories, like hoses and various brushes for furniture or drapes. It’s simple for light floor vacuuming. It is perfect for light everyday vacuuming, especially because it is so light, cordless and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinda

customer_reviews.title: this may be the best purchase I have made in my senior years
customer_reviews.text: this may be the best purchase I have made in my senior years, I am 79 , I have all wood floors. this vacuum is so light & easy to use,no bulky, tangling cord to deal with, , it cleans the floor very good. I have 2 inside dogs, I keep my 2 great grans, ages 7 & 9 & we have a pool, so I do have a lot of traffic. for small clean ups, just pick this light weight vacuum up, no cord, & it's done. I put the charger in the laundry room, so easy to just sit the vacuum on the small but powerful charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I would call this a vacuum. It plugs up instantly. The intake hole in the base is tiny so if you have pets or for that matter anything larger than fine dust you don't want this piece of crap. I'm tired of buying things from Amazon and going through the hassle of returning them. Most of the stuff they sell is Chinese made garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Shark Navigator Freestyle
customer_reviews.text: We like this vacuum and is the second one we bought. First one lasted 5 years which I’m satisfied with given the cost. We use it almost daily for picking up dust and hair on hard surface floors and it works great for that. I’m not sure how effective it would be for deep cleaning carpets. It’s light weight and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a $400 bissel that has same functionality but is always in the shop. Additionally my Bissell has a shortlife battery. This product is amazing! I can vacuum my entire home on one battery charge, it sucks everything up and is lightweight and super-easy to clean and use. I can't believe how much joy this little gadget brings into my life. Owning two dogs means I vacuum daily and this thing keeps up with the demand. I am buying them for my parents, my sister, my sons, everyone on my Christmas list is getting this incredible life-altering vacuum whether they like it or not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work right as it did at first!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: No more suction!!️ Very HEAVY & Unwieldy!! Spitting out debris!! Doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little vac
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this vacuum for use downstairs after I rescued a dog. I love that I do not have to haul out my big vacuum every time to clean up just a few random leaves, dirt and/or hair. However, this quickly changed to my go-to machine. I use it on my thick shag rugs, the stairs and the suction is amazing. I bought one for my sister for Christmas and initially she was annoyed since she already has a Dyson and "didn't need another vacuum", however, within a few uses she admitted she is in love. I haven't tried any other cordless vacs, but with this I am a fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: NO SUCTION! Don't even think about it.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for dust on a hard wood floor but it wont pick up anything larger than a bread crumb and glides over carpets doing nothin. It's very light weight yeah, but it not worth it because it doesn't have any suction and has turning issues making it hard to maneuver around furniture. STAY AWAY! I was surprised since I have several corded SHARKS like the ROTATOR PRO and they are awesome! Keep trying Shark techs this one missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sopala

customer_reviews.title: I love thos vacuum like I've never loved before!
customer_reviews.text: I think someone else said they never knew they could love a vacuum....and I agree. This thing gets all my crumbs from my unsealed hardwood floors and I'd marry the machine if I could. It's already paid for itself and I will never go without a shark vacuum ever again! Life saver with 2 kids and 2 dogs. Plus super light. I feel the canister holds my entire house before having to empty.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

product_meta.title: Shark Navigator Freestyle Upright Stick Cordless Bagless Vacuum for Carpet, Hard Floor and Pet with XL Dust Cup and 2-Speed Brushroll (SV1106), White/Grey
product_meta.description:
Color:White/GreyShark Navigator Freestyle Upright Stick Cordless Bagless Vacuum for Carpet, Hard Floor and Pet with XL Dust Cup and 2-Speed Brush roll (SV1106), White/Grey.

BRAND STORY
By Shark
feature_bullets: Dust cup capacity 0.64 quarts; Cordless convenience
2 speeds settings optimized for carpet & bare floor
Extra-large, easy to empty dust cup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars7,926 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Shark Bagless Navigator Freestyle Cordless Stick Vacuum
